title: India has only 0.8 incubators per million, US, UK China has 8-10:Study
description: Despite a growing startup ecosystem, only 8.2% of startups in India undergo incubation, with 10% of incubators supporting 98% of these startups. The report emphasizes the need for more incubators and improved performance, especially outside Tier I cities and in underrepresented sectors.
